titles.title: Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2014
To extend the requirement that drug manufacturers that increase prices faster than inflation pay an additional rebate to State Medicaid programs to include manufacturers of generic drugs.
Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Medicaid Generic Drug Price Fairness Act of 2014 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend to manufacturers of generic drugs the requirement that drug manufacturers in certain circumstances pay an additional rebate to state Medicaid programs.
